references.paper_title: Equivariant message passing for the prediction of tensorial properties and molecular spectra
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel message passing architecture that is equivariant to rotations, which improves the accuracy and efficiency of predicting molecular properties.

references.paper_title: E(3)-equivariant graph neural networks for data-efficient and accurate interatomic potentials
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art method for learning interatomic potentials, which is based on equivariant graph neural networks and achieves high accuracy with minimal data.

references.paper_title: MACE: Higher Order Equivariant Message Passing Neural Networks for Fast and Accurate Force Fields
references.reason: This paper introduces the MACE architecture, a highly efficient and accurate method for learning many-body interatomic potentials, which outperforms existing methods on various benchmarks.

references.paper_title: TensorNet: Cartesian Tensor Representations for Efficient Learning of Molecular Potentials
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for learning molecular potentials that uses Cartesian tensors and improves accuracy and efficiency compared to spherical harmonics based methods.

references.paper_title: SchNet: A continuous-filter convolutional neural network for modeling quantum interactions
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work in the field of machine learning for materials science, introducing a novel neural network architecture for modeling quantum interactions and achieving high accuracy.
